remarks: Any two paths in a simply connected space with the same start and end point are path-homotopic.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)
statement:
sconpht2.1 $e |- ( ph -> J e. SCon ) $.
sconpht2.2 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( II Cn J ) ) $.
sconpht2.3 $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( II Cn J ) ) $.
sconpht2.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` 0 ) = ( G ` 0 ) ) $.
sconpht2.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` 1 ) = ( G ` 1 ) ) $.
sconpht2 $p |- ( ph -> F ( ~=ph ` J ) G ) $.
